item.title: 6 Herbs Proven To Help Treat Depression And Anxiety | Care2 Healthy Living
item.description:
6 Herbs Proven To Help Treat Depression And Anxiety | Care2 Healthy Living

Antidepressant medications are among the most widely prescribed drugs in the world. Possible side effects include impaired sexual function, suicidal thoughts, an increased risk for internal bleeding and potential withdrawal-like symptoms when the drugs are discontinued. Herbal remedies may provide a more natural way to treat depression and anxiety with less potential side effects.

item.title: Smart indoor garden discreetly grows plants and herbs
item.description:
Smart indoor garden discreetly grows plants and herbs

A Canadian-based team has launched a product aimed at individuals who want to grow plants and herbs year-round without all the guesswork. The Grobo indoor gardening system features smart tech designed to simulate ideal growing conditions while providing real-time information to users.

item.title: Ayurveda 101: Health Benefits of 8 Common Spices and Herbs
item.description:
Ayurveda 101: Health Benefits of 8 Common Spices and Herbs

The age-old adage "you are what you eat" loosely sums up the premise of Ayurveda. Ayurveda is a holistic approach to health based on balance-one's diet profoundly sustains the mind and body's equilibrium. It is also believed that in eating correctly, food can be not only medicinal but also preemptive in maintaining the body's immunity to disease.

item.title: Should I Smoke Herbs?
item.description:
Should I Smoke Herbs?

When you hear the word "smoking" your mind probably conjures up some of the graphic images you'll see on cigarette packs. Tar-clogged air passages, horribly malformed lungs, rotting teeth... that kind of thing. They are scare tactics designed by health-conscious governments to educate those who smoke on what they're really doing to their bodies.
